title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Physical / Mobility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Physical / Mobility              Physical / Mobility        Accessibility for those with limited mobility and/or those in wheelchairs is provided by a lift in the visitor center. The basement, second, and third floors do not have accessibility assistance at this time.  House tours require moderate to long periods of standing. Portable stools are available from rangers upon request.
